#Getting insurancea
```{r, warning=FALSE}
library(tidycensus)
library(tigris)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
insurance10 <- get_acs("county", 
                 table = "B27001",
                 year = 2018, 
                 output = "tidy", 
                 state = NULL, 
                 geometry = TRUE, 
                 shift_geo = TRUE,
                  key = api_key, 
                  cache_table = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyr)
insurance <- mutate(insurance10,
  req = case_when(
    variable %in% paste0("B27001_0",
      c("09","12","15","37","40","43")) ~ "pop18_44",
    variable %in% paste0("B27001_0",
      c("11","14","17","39","42","45")) ~ "pop1844uni")) %>%
  filter(!is.na(req))
```

```{r}
insurance <- group_by(insurance, GEOID, NAME, req) %>%
  summarize(estimate = sum(estimate)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  tidyr::spread(req, estimate) 

insurance <- mutate(insurance, uninsured_percent = (pop1844uni/pop18_44) * 100) %>%
  select(-c(pop18_44, pop1844uni)) 
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = insurance, mapping = aes(geometry = geometry,
                                fill = uninsured_percent)) + 
  geom_sf() +
  coord_sf() +
  scale_fill_viridis_c() + theme_void()
```
